documentation.text:
@dev Many functions in this contract were taken from this repository:
 https://github.com/atpar/funds-distribution-token/blob/master/contracts/FundsDistributionToken.sol
 which is an example implementation of ERC 2222, the draft for which can be found at
 https://github.com/atpar/funds-distribution-token/blob/master/EIP-DRAFT.md
 This contract has been substantially modified from the original and does not comply with ERC 2222.
 Many functions were renamed as "dividends" rather than "funds" and the core functionality was separated
 into this abstract contract which can be inherited by anything tracking ownership of dividend shares.

@notice Distributes dividends to token holders.
 @dev It reverts if the total supply is 0.
 It emits the `FundsDistributed` event if the amount to distribute is greater than 0.
 About undistributed dividends:
   In each distribution, there is a small amount which does not get distributed,
   which is `(amount * POINTS_MULTIPLIER) % totalShares()`.
   With a well-chosen `POINTS_MULTIPLIER`, the amount of funds that are not getting
   distributed in a distribution can be less than 1 (base unit).

devdoc.details: Many functions in this contract were taken from this repository: https://github.com/atpar/funds-distribution-token/blob/master/contracts/FundsDistributionToken.sol which is an example implementation of ERC 2222, the draft for which can be found at https://github.com/atpar/funds-distribution-token/blob/master/EIP-DRAFT.md This contract has been substantially modified from the original and does not comply with ERC 2222. Many functions were renamed as "dividends" rather than "funds" and the core functionality was separated into this abstract contract which can be inherited by anything tracking ownership of dividend shares.

params.account: The address of a token holder.

returns._0: The amount of dividends that `account` has earned in total.

withdrawableDividendsOf(address).details: Returns the total amount of dividends a given address is able to withdraw.

returns._0: A uint256 representing the dividends `account` can withdraw

params.account: The address of a token holder.

returns._0: The amount of dividends that `account` has withdrawn.

cumulativeDividendsOf(address).notice: View the amount of dividends that an address has earned in total.

withdrawnDividendsOf(address).notice: View the amount of dividends that an address has withdrawn.
